0KR.F.summary: Kopy Goldfields AB (publ) operates as a gold exploration and production company in Russia. The company holds interests in 12 licenses covering an area of approximately 2,156 square kilometers located in the Lena Goldfields of Siberia and in the Amur Region of the Russian Far East. Its flagship project is the Krasny project that consists of three licenses with a total area of 119 square kilometers. The company is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

284.F.summary: Serstech AB provides chemical identification instruments worldwide. It offers the Serstech 100 Indicator, a handheld, small, and light Raman spectrometer for measuring chemicals, such as explosives, narcotics, toxic industrial chemicals, pharmaceuticals, and chemical warfare agents; and ChemDash, a chemical intelligence software for measuring, storing, analyzing, and sharing information. It provides its solutions for explosive, CBRN and hazmat, narcotics, pharma, material inspection and QA, process control, product development, and educational applications. Serstech AB was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Lund, Sweden.

2HW.F.summary: Bergs Timber AB (publ) produces, distributes, and sells sawn and processed timber products in Sweden, the United Kingdom, and internationally. It offers structural timber in spruce and pine forms; treated timber products; and gardening products, windows, doors, and prefabricated houses. The company also provides cellulose chips and sawdust for the production of paper pulp, heat, and energy; and forestry services. In addition, it operates sawmills; and sells by-products from manufacture to the pulp and particle board industries. The company was formerly known as CF Berg & Co. Bergs Timber AB (publ) was founded in 1919 and is headquartered in Vimmerby, Sweden.

4QT1.F.summary: HEXPOL AB (publ) develops, manufactures, and sells various polymer compounds and engineered products in Sweden and internationally. It operates through two business areas, HEXPOL Compounding and HEXPOL Engineered Products. The HEXPOL Compounding business area offers rubber compounds, including elastomers, such as silicone and fluoro-carbon rubber; and thermoplastic elastomer and thermoplastic compounds for the automotive and engineering, construction, transportation, energy, oil and gas, consumer, and cable and wire industries, as well as manufacturers of medical technology. The HEXPOL Engineered Products business area provides gaskets for plate heat exchangers and other applications. It also provides polyurethane, plastic, and rubber wheels for forklifts and material handling applications. The company was founded in 1893 and is headquartered in MalmÃ¶, Sweden.

5KG0.F.summary: Bluelake Mineral AB (publ) operates as a mineral exploration company. It explores for nickel and gold deposits, as well as hydrocarbons. The company owns interests in the RÃ¶nnbÃ¤cken project, which covers an area of approximately 15 square kilometers located in VÃ¤sterbotten, Sweden; OrrbÃ¤cken project covering an area of approximately 261 hectares located in VÃ¤sterbotten, Sweden; and Kattisavan project covering 888 hectares located in Lapland, Sweden. It also owns interests in the Ellej-Igajskoje license located in Tomsk Oblast, Russia. The company was formerly known as Nickel Mountain Resources AB (publ) and changed its name to Bluelake Mineral AB (publ) in December 2020. The company was incorporated in 1994 and is headquartered in Gothenburg, Sweden. Bluelake Mineral AB (publ) is a subsidiary of Archelon AB (publ).

5L8.F.summary: Svenska Aerogel Holding AB (publ), through its subsidiary, engages in the research, development, production, and sale of aerogel in Europe, North America, and Asia. It offers Quartzene, a non-flammable material, which is used to enhance the performance of various products and solutions, such as paint and coatings, thermal insulation, and filtration of liquids and gases. The company sells its products through direct sales channels and resellers. Svenska Aerogel Holding AB (publ) is headquartered in GÃ¤vle, Sweden.

AERO.ST.summary: Svenska Aerogel Holding AB (publ), through its subsidiary, engages in the research, development, production, and sale of aerogel in Europe, North America, and Asia. It offers Quartzene, a non-flammable material, which is used to enhance the performance of various products and solutions, such as paint and coatings, thermal insulation, and filtration of liquids and gases. The company sells its products through direct sales channels and resellers. Svenska Aerogel Holding AB (publ) is headquartered in GÃ¤vle, Sweden.

ARCT.ST.summary: Arctic Minerals AB (publ), through its subsidiaries, engages in exploration and mining of mineral properties in the Norway and Sweden. The company explores for gold, copper, and zinc deposits. It primarily holds interests in Bidjovagge gold-copper project that covers a total of 9 extraction permits totaling 7.16 square kilometers at Bidjovagge, as well as 1 exploration permit covering 1 square kilometer located in Finnmark, Northern Norway. The company was formerly known as Arctic Gold AB (publ) and changed its name to Arctic Minerals AB (publ) in December 2017. Arctic Minerals AB (publ) was founded in 1999 and is based in Ãstersund, Sweden.

AUR.ST.summary: Auriant Mining AB (publ), a junior mining company, engages in the exploration and production of gold in Russia. The company holds interest in two producing mines, including the Tardan project in the Republic of Tyva and the Solcocon project in the Zabaikalsky region. It also holds interests in the Uzhunzhul project, an early stage exploration property located in the Republic of Khakassia; and the Kara-Beldyr project, an advanced exploration property located in the Republic of Tyva. The company was formerly known as Central Asia Gold AB and changed its name to Auriant Mining AB (publ) in June 2012. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden. Auriant Mining AB (publ) is a subsidiary of Bertil Holdings Limited.

BDNNY.summary: Boliden AB (publ) engages in exploring, extracting, and processing base metals and precious metals. It operates in two segments, Business Area Mines and Business Area Smelters. The company explores for mineral deposits, such as zinc, copper, lead, nickel, gold, palladium, platinum, and silver. It operates the Aitik, the Boliden Area, and Garpenberg mines in Sweden; the Tara mine in Ireland; and the Kylylahti and Kevitsa mines in Finland. The company's smelters produce mainly zinc ingots, copper cathodes, lead ingots, gold and silver granules, and other products, such as sulphuric acid, zinc clinker, sulphur dioxide, and palladium concentrate. The company sells its metals primarily to industrial customers, as well as to construction, electronics and automotive industries; and lead to battery manufacturers. It operates in Sweden, other Nordic region, Germany, the United Kingdom, other European countries, North America, and internationally. The company has a strategic collaboration agreement with LuleÃ¥ University of Technology to develop technology and strengthening competence in mining and smelting operations. Boliden AB (publ) was founded in 1924 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

BEGR.ST.summary: BE Group AB (publ) operates as a trading and service company in steel, stainless steel, and aluminum products in Sweden, Finland, Estonia, Latvia, Lithuania, Poland, and the Czech Republic. The company offers long steel products comprising beams, hollow sections, steel bars, and steel tubes; flat steel products, such as plates and sheets in various forms, including hot-rolled, cold-rolled, or metal-coated; and engineering steel comprising rods and hollow cast blanks. It also provides stainless steel assortment, such as plates, sheets, bars, tubes, and tube parts; reinforcement steel and reinforcement mesh products; and aluminium products, such as plates, sheets, profiles, bars and tubes. In addition, the company offers production services, such as cutting, blasting, and painting of hollow sections, as well as material advice, logistics solutions, and timesaving IT services that include web-based e-commerce, EDI, digital notifications, and electronic invoices. It markets and sells its products directly, and through distributors and steel service centers primarily to construction and manufacturing industries. The company was founded in 1885 and is headquartered in MalmÃ¶, Sweden.

BILL.ST.summary: BillerudKorsnÃ¤s AB (publ) provides fiber based packaging materials and solutions in Sweden and internationally. It operates through three segments: Division Paper, Division Board, and Division Solutions. The Division Paper segment offers kraft and sack paper for manufacturing, medical equipment, and consumer segments. The Division Board segment manufactures and sells liquid packaging and carton boards, as well as fluting and liners. The Division Solutions segment provides packaging solutions and systems for brand owners. The company serves packaging manufacturers, brand owners, and large retail and supermarket chains. BillerudKorsnÃ¤s AB (publ) is headquartered in Solna, Sweden.

BNF.F.summary: BillerudKorsnÃ¤s AB (publ) provides fiber based packaging materials and solutions in Sweden and internationally. It operates through three segments: Division Paper, Division Board, and Division Solutions. The Division Paper segment offers kraft and sack paper for manufacturing, medical equipment, and consumer segments. The Division Board segment manufactures and sells liquid packaging and carton boards, as well as fluting and liners. The Division Solutions segment provides packaging solutions and systems for brand owners. The company serves packaging manufacturers, brand owners, and large retail and supermarket chains. BillerudKorsnÃ¤s AB (publ) is headquartered in Solna, Sweden.

BOTX.ST.summary: Botnia Exploration Holding AB (publ), together with its subsidiaries, engages in the exploration of precious and base metals in Sweden. The company explores for gold, silver, lead, zinc, and copper. Its project portfolio includes gold and sulphide ore projects with five exploration licenses and two processing concessions in the VargbÃ¤cken and FÃ¤bodtjÃ¤rn areas. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Nacka Strand, Sweden.

BRG-B.ST.summary: Bergs Timber AB (publ) produces, distributes, and sells sawn and processed timber products in Sweden, the United Kingdom, and internationally. It offers structural timber in spruce and pine forms; treated timber products; and gardening products, windows, doors, and prefabricated houses. The company also provides cellulose chips and sawdust for the production of paper pulp, heat, and energy; and forestry services. In addition, it operates sawmills; and sells by-products from manufacture to the pulp and particle board industries. The company was formerly known as CF Berg & Co. COPP-B.ST.summary: Copperstone Resources AB operates as a base and precious metals exploration company in Sweden. The company primarily explores for copper, zinc, gold, and silver ores, as well as cobalt and iron ores. It holds 100% interests in the Copperstone project located on the southeast of Arvidsjaur. The company also has interests Viscaria Copper project located in the Kiruna region.  The company was formerly known as Kopparberg Mineral AB (publ) and changed its name to Copperstone Resources AB (publ) in February 2015. Copperstone Resources AB (publ) was founded in 2006 and is headquatered in Danderyd, Sweden.

GRNG.ST.summary: GrÃ¤nges AB (publ) develops, produces, and distributes rolled aluminum products for brazed heat exchanger and niche applications in Europe, Asia, and the Americas. The company offers clad tubes, clad fins, unclad fins, and clad plates. It serves automotive, as well as heating, ventilation, and air conditioning industries; and other markets, such as transformers and food packaging industries. The company was founded in 1896 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

HOLM-A.ST.summary: Holmen AB (publ) produces and sells paperboards, papers, wood products, and renewable energy in Sweden, Germany, the United Kingdom, Italy, France, Poland, rest of Europe, Asia, and internationally. The company's Forest segment offers logs, pulpwood, and biofuel to sawmills, pulp mills, and paperboard and paper mills; and manages forests, which cover approximately one million hectares. Its Paperboard segment provides paperboards for consumer packaging to brand owners, converters, and wholesalers. The company's Paper segment offers papers for books, magazines, printed advertising, and newsprints to publishers, printing firms, and retailers. Its Wood Products segment provides construction and joinery timber, spruce and pine products, and wood for pallets and packaging to construction, joinery, and packaging industries, as well as builders' merchants; and operates sawmills. The company's Renewable Energy segment operates 21 hydro power stations; and wind farms with a capacity of approximately 1.1 TWh of electricity. Holmen AB (publ) was founded in 1609 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

HOLM-B.ST.summary: Holmen AB (publ) produces and sells paperboards, papers, wood products, and renewable energy in Sweden, Germany, the United Kingdom, Italy, France, Poland, rest of Europe, Asia, and internationally. The company's Forest segment offers logs, pulpwood, and biofuel to sawmills, pulp mills, and paperboard and paper mills; and manages forests, which cover approximately one million hectares. Its Paperboard segment provides paperboards for consumer packaging to brand owners, converters, and wholesalers. The company's Paper segment offers papers for books, magazines, printed advertising, and newsprints to publishers, printing firms, and retailers. Its Wood Products segment provides construction and joinery timber, spruce and pine products, and wood for pallets and packaging to construction, joinery, and packaging industries, as well as builders' merchants; and operates sawmills. The company's Renewable Energy segment operates 21 hydro power stations; and wind farms with a capacity of approximately 1.1 TWh of electricity. Holmen AB (publ) was founded in 1609 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

It operates through two business areas, HEXPOL Compounding and HEXPOL Engineered Products. The HEXPOL Compounding business area offers rubber compounds, including elastomers, such as silicone and fluoro-carbon rubber; and thermoplastic elastomer and thermoplastic compounds for the automotive and engineering, construction, transportation, energy, oil and gas, consumer, and cable and wire industries, as well as manufacturers of medical technology. The HEXPOL Engineered Products business area provides gaskets for plate heat exchangers and other applications. It also provides polyurethane, plastic, and rubber wheels for forklifts and material handling applications. The company was founded in 1893 and is headquartered in MalmÃ¶, Sweden.

It operates through two business areas, HEXPOL Compounding and HEXPOL Engineered Products. The HEXPOL Compounding business area offers rubber compounds, including elastomers, such as silicone and fluoro-carbon rubber; and thermoplastic elastomer and thermoplastic compounds for the automotive and engineering, construction, transportation, energy, oil and gas, consumer, and cable and wire industries, as well as manufacturers of medical technology. The HEXPOL Engineered Products business area provides gaskets for plate heat exchangers and other applications. It also provides polyurethane, plastic, and rubber wheels for forklifts and material handling applications. The company was founded in 1893 and is headquartered in MalmÃ¶, Sweden.

KAKEL.ST.summary: Kakel Max AB (publ) operates in the building ceramic market in Sweden. It offers tiles and other bathroom accessories. The company sells its products through project customers and retailers, as well as through its own network of stores. Kakel Max AB (publ) was founded in 1987 and is based in ÃstervÃ¥la, Sweden.

KOPY.ST.summary: Kopy Goldfields AB (publ) operates as a gold exploration and production company in Russia. The company holds interests in 12 licenses covering an area of approximately 2,156 square kilometers located in the Lena Goldfields of Siberia and in the Amur Region of the Russian Far East. Its flagship project is the Krasny project that consists of three licenses with a total area of 119 square kilometers. The company is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

NC4.F.summary: Nexam Chemical Holding AB (publ) develops solutions that enhance properties and performance of various types of polymers in Sweden. It offers various products that enhance the properties and durability of polyesters, polyethylene, polyamides, polyimides, and high temperature resins, as well as produces functional substances, multifunctional masterbatches, additive masterbatches and compounds, color masterbatches and compounds, and recycling performance masterbatches under the NEXAMITE and NEXIMID names. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Lomma, Sweden.

NEXAM.ST.summary: Nexam Chemical Holding AB (publ) develops solutions that enhance properties and performance of various types of polymers in Sweden. It offers various products that enhance the properties and durability of polyesters, polyethylene, polyamides, polyimides, and high temperature resins, as well as produces functional substances, multifunctional masterbatches, additive masterbatches and compounds, color masterbatches and compounds, and recycling performance masterbatches under the NEXAMITE and NEXIMID names. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Lomma, Sweden.

NPAPER.ST.summary: Nordic Paper Holding AB produces and sells greaseproof and kraft paper in Scandinavia and internationally. The company offers baking and cooking paper, baking cups, packaging paper, cooking and catering paper, and specialty paper. It also provides pulp. The company was founded in 1871 and is based in Kristinehamn, Sweden. Nordic Paper Holding AB is a subsidiary of Shanying International Holdings Co.,Ltd.

NPH.F.summary: Nordic Paper Holding AB produces and sells natural greaseproof and kraft paper in Scandinavia and internationally. It also provides pulp. The company was founded in 1871 and is based in Kristinehamn, Sweden. Nordic Paper Holding AB is a subsidiary of Shanying International Holdings Co.,Ltd.

ORGC.ST.summary: OrganoClick AB (publ), a material and chemical technology company, develops, produces, and markets fiber-based materials and chemicals in Sweden. It offers OrganoWood, a wooden material that is resistant to fungal decay and fire for construction companies and consumers; OrganoTex, a fluorocarbon-free water repellent additive, which is used as a durable water repellant additive for textile mills, as well as a spray-on or wash-in products by consumers; and OrganoComp, a biodegradable and renewable biocomposite for use in various applications. The company also provides OC-BioBinder, a bio-based and biodegradable binder based on modified biopolymers and natural plant compounds; and OC-aquasil Tex, a water repellent for technical textiles and nonwovens, as well as protects them from water-based soiling, such as stains from red wine, coffee, ketchup, etc. In addition, it offers facade wash, roof wash, and algae and mold removers, as well as wood protection systems, and maintenance and cleaning products under the Biokleen name for houses, properties, and cars and heavy transportation vehicles. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in TÃ¤by, Sweden.

POLYG.ST.summary: Polygiene AB (publ.) develops, manufactures, and sells odor control solutions for clothes, sports equipment, textiles, and other materials in Asia, Europe, North America, and internationally. The company serves partners in the sports and outdoor, lifestyle, home design, footwear, and workwear segments. It offers its products under the Polygiene brand. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in MalmÃ¶, Sweden.

RROS.ST.summary: Rottneros AB (publ) produces and sells pulp worldwide. It produces chemical pulp for use in electrical applications, filters, paper, and boards; mechanical pulp for use in paper, boards, tissue paper, and filters; and fiber trays for food and technical products. The company was founded in 1916 and is based in Vallvik, Sweden. Rottneros AB (publ) is a subsidiary of Arctic Paper S.A.

SCA-A.ST.short_name: Svenska Cellulosa AB SCA ser. A
SCA-A.ST.summary: Svenska Cellulosa Aktiebolaget SCA (publ), a forest products company, develops, produces, and sells forest, wood, pulp, and paper products worldwide. The company offers wood products to the home improvement and building materials sectors, including machined softwood, carcassing, MDF, decking, and sheet materials for builders' merchants and DIY retailers; and various wood products, industrial components, standard wood products, and raw materials, as well as logistic, warehouse, and IT solutions for the wood industry. It also provides decking, carcassing, softwood PSE, door lining and casing, softwood molding, composite decking, sheet material, and MDF molding wood products for use in homes; and softwood shavings for horses. In addition, the company offers pulp products under the Pure, Star, and Cirrus names; coated papers, including glossy and matt surfaces; uncoated printing paper; and Kraftliner products for consumer durables, electronics, hazardous goods, industrial products, fruit and vegetables, frozen foods, etc. Further, it provides forwarding services for various transport modes, such as truck, rail, and barge, as well as marine and road and rail transport; and liquid biofuels, solid biofuels, pellets, stall pellets, and wind energy. Additionally, the company engages in the distribution and wholesale of wood products; production of Kraft and chemical thermomechanical pulps, and containerboards; and publication of paper for magazines, catalogues, and commercial print. Svenska Cellulosa Aktiebolaget SCA (publ) was founded in 1929 and is headquartered in Sundsvall, Sweden.

SCA-B.ST.short_name: Svenska Cellulosa AB SCA ser. B
SCA-B.ST.summary: Svenska Cellulosa Aktiebolaget SCA (publ), a forest products company, develops, produces, and sells forest, wood, pulp, and paper products worldwide. The company offers wood products to the home improvement and building materials sectors, including machined softwood, carcassing, MDF, decking, and sheet materials for builders' merchants and DIY retailers; and various wood products, industrial components, standard wood products, and raw materials, as well as logistic, warehouse, and IT solutions for the wood industry. It also provides decking, carcassing, softwood PSE, door lining and casing, softwood molding, composite decking, sheet material, and MDF molding wood products for use in homes; and softwood shavings for horses. In addition, the company offers pulp products under the Celeste, Star, and Cirrus names; coated papers, including glossy and matt surfaces; uncoated printing paper; and Kraftliner products for consumer durables, electronics, hazardous goods, industrial products, fruit and vegetables, frozen foods, etc. Further, it provides forwarding services for various transport modes, such as truck, rail, and barge, as well as marine and road transport; and liquid biofuels, solid biofuels, pellets, stall pellets, and wind energy. Additionally, the company engages in the distribution and wholesale of wood products; production of Kraft and chemical thermomechanical pulps, and containerboards; and publication of paper for magazines, catalogues, and commercial print. Svenska Cellulosa Aktiebolaget SCA (publ) was founded in 1929 and is headquartered in Sundsvall, Sweden.

SERT.ST.summary: Serstech AB provides chemical identification instruments worldwide. It offers the Serstech 100 Indicator, a handheld, small, and light Raman spectrometer for measuring chemicals, such as explosives, narcotics, toxic industrial chemicals, pharmaceuticals, and chemical warfare agents; and ChemDash, a chemical intelligence software for measuring, storing, analyzing, and sharing information. It provides its solutions for explosive, CBRN and hazmat, narcotics, pharma, material inspection and QA, process control, product development, and educational applications. Serstech AB was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Lund, Sweden.

SKWA.F.summary: SSAB AB (publ) produces and sells steel products in the United States, Sweden, Finland, Germany, Denmark, and internationally. It operates in five segments: SSAB Special Steels, SSAB Europe, SSAB Americas, Tibnor, and Ruukki Construction. The SSAB Special Steels segment offers quenched and tempered steels, and hot-rolled advanced high-strength steel products. The SSAB Europe segment provides strip, plate, and tubular products The SSAB Americas segment offers heavy steel plates. The Tibnor segment distributes a range of steel and non-ferrous metals in the Nordic region and the Baltics. The Ruukki Construction segment produces and sells building and construction products and services for residential and non-residential construction. The company markets its steel products under the Strenx, Hardox, Docol, GreenCoat, Toolox, Armox, SSAB Boron, SSAB Domex, SSAB Form, SSAB Laser, SSAB Weathering and Cor-Ten, and SSAB Multisteel brands. It serves the heavy transport, construction, automotive, industrial, construction machinery, energy, material handling, and service center industries. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

SOSI1.HE.summary: Sotkamo Silver AB, together with its subsidiaries, explores for and develops mineral deposits in the Nordic region. The company primarily explores for silver, gold, lead, and zinc deposits. Its primary project is the Silver Mine project located in the municipality of Sotkamo in Finland. The company is based in Stockholm, Sweden.

It operates in five segments: SSAB Special Steels, SSAB Europe, SSAB Americas, Tibnor, and Ruukki Construction. The SSAB Special Steels segment offers quenched and tempered steels, and hot-rolled advanced high-strength steel products. The SSAB Europe segment provides strip, plate, and tubular products The SSAB Americas segment offers heavy steel plates. It serves the heavy transport, construction, automotive, industrial, construction machinery, energy, material handling, and service center industries. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

SSABBH.HE.summary: SSAB AB (publ) produces and sells steel products in the United States, Sweden, Finland, Germany, Denmark, and internationally. It operates in five segments: SSAB Special Steels, SSAB Europe, SSAB Americas, Tibnor, and Ruukki Construction. The SSAB Special Steels segment offers quenched and tempered steels, and hot-rolled advanced high-strength steel products. The SSAB Europe segment provides strip, plate, and tubular products The SSAB Americas segment offers heavy steel plates. The Tibnor segment distributes a range of steel and non-ferrous metals in the Nordic region and the Baltics. The Ruukki Construction segment produces and sells building and construction products and services for residential and non-residential construction. The company markets its steel products under the Strenx, Hardox, Docol, GreenCoat, Toolox, Armox, SSAB Boron, SSAB Domex, SSAB Form, SSAB Laser, SSAB Weathering and Cor-Ten, and SSAB Multisteel brands. It serves the heavy transport, construction, automotive, industrial, construction machinery, energy, material handling, and service center industries. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

SVCBF.summary: Svenska Cellulosa Aktiebolaget SCA (publ), a forest products company, develops, produces, and sells forest, wood, pulp, and paper products worldwide. The company offers wood products to the home improvement and building materials sectors, including machined softwood, carcassing, MDF, decking, and sheet materials for builders' merchants and DIY retailers; and various wood products, industrial components, standard wood products, and raw materials, as well as logistic, warehouse, and IT solutions for the wood industry. It also provides decking, carcassing, softwood PSE, door lining and casing, softwood molding, composite decking, sheet material, and MDF molding wood products for use in homes; and softwood shavings for horses. In addition, the company offers pulp products under the Celeste, Star, and Cirrus names; coated papers, including glossy and matt surfaces; uncoated printing paper; and Kraftliner products for consumer durables, electronics, hazardous goods, industrial products, fruit and vegetables, frozen foods, etc. Further, it provides forwarding services for various transport modes, such as truck, rail, and barge, as well as marine and road transport; and liquid biofuels, solid biofuels, pellets, stall pellets, and wind energy. Additionally, the company engages in the distribution and wholesale of wood products; production of Kraft and chemical thermomechanical pulps, and containerboards; and publication of paper for magazines, catalogues, and commercial print. Svenska Cellulosa Aktiebolaget SCA (publ) was founded in 1929 and is headquartered in Sundsvall, Sweden.

TRIBO-B.ST.summary: Triboron International AB (publ) operates as a green technology company in Sweden. It offers consumer and professional fuel formulas, two-stroke formula concentrates, and two-stroke injection formulas that are mixed with fuel to reduce friction, as well as enhance the efficiency of the engine and emission control system under the Triboron brand name. The company is based in Kista, Sweden.

VSO.F.summary: Sotkamo Silver AB, together with its subsidiaries, explores for and develops mineral deposits in the Nordic region. The company primarily explores for silver, gold, lead, and zinc deposits. Its primary project is the Silver Mine project located in the municipality of Sotkamo in Finland. The company is based in Stockholm, Sweden.
